entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement extension method to go from Position -> SourceLocation #35679
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, razor.tooling-fundamentals
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef #35667
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef #35666
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • started getting JWT Error : www-authenticate: Bearer error="invalid_token" after porting from .NET 5 to .NET 6 #35664
    area-security
  • [Feature] Custom route tokens #35661
    area-mvc, feature-routing
  • Request QueryString keys became case-sensitive #35662
    area-runtime
  • QUESTION: How to configure ASP.net Core to work with kubernetes NGINX ingress #35660
  • UserManager.SetAuthenticationTokenAsync() is not updating an entity #35656
    area-identity
  • Blazor - System.ObjectDisposedException: 'Cannot process pending renders after the renderer has been disposed. Object name: 'Renderer'.' #35655
    investigate, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Upload CSV File in Blazor hast the wron Format of German "Umlaute" #35653
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor
  • Capture Endpoint and RouteValues on IStatusCodeReExecuteFeature #35652
    area-runtime, api-suggestion
  • Inline SVG is not rendered properly #35650
    investigate, area-blazor, feature-rendering, Backlog
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #35649
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • In most cases, the site can be started up during production. Occasionally, an error of 500.30 will be reported when the site is started up #35647
    area-dataprotection
  • Add cancellation tokens to Razor tooling code #35645
    area-razor.tooling, razor.tooling-fundamentals

Closed

  • Update Omnisharp to latest #35622
    task, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.languageserver, feature-razor.vs, feature-razor.vscode, 17.0-Preview4
  • Hot reload script 'aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js' connection issues #34975
    bug, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Kestrel reset error when no reset received #34768
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP2, 6.0-rc1
  • Consoliate the browser refresh middleware into a single middleware #34951
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, 6.0-rc2
  • Uint8Array created by byte[] deserialization in javascript has incorrect buffer property byteLength #35597
    investigate, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-jsinterop, blazor-server, 6.0-rc2
  • Allow more failure details for AuthZ handlers #35319
    area-security, api-approved, 6.0-rc1
  • Implicit call to UseRouting() in WebApplicationBuilder creates ordering issue with pipeline rerunning middleware, e.g. UseExceptionHandler #34146
    area-runtime, Priority:0, feature-minimal-hosting, 6.0-rc1
  • Startup improvement: single_query #35628
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35478
    area-runtime, api-approved, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc1
  • Add BatchSize to W3CLoggerOptions #35545
    area-runtime, api-suggestion
  • W3CLog ends up in the wrong file at the end of the day #35546
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: By Design, area-runtime, Status: Resolved
  • [SPA] Using floating versions on the SPA repo in eng/Versions.props #35608
    task, area-mvc, feature-spa
  • .NET 6 Blazor Server hosted from another project fails with routing issue #35648
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Blazor WASM project - incorrect rendering of currency symbol in en-gb #35651
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Duplicate, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Status: Resolved
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #35642
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Blazor download size regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #35641
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Error in .NET 6 SDK when building a Blazor Wasm project that transitive referencing a Razor Class Library package built by .NET 5 SDK that contains static web assets #35590
    question, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-static-web-assets
  • Return the path in error handling #35596
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • Throws MessagePack.MessagePackSerializationException when simultaneously sending same message to multiple connected clients #35595
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr
  • Support DateOnly and TimeOnly as parsing options for [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #35525
    Done, enhancement, area-blazor, feature-blazor-builtin-components, 6.0-rc2
  • `{Date, Time}Only` Querystring building APIs for Blazor #35567
    Done, enhancement, area-blazor, api-approved, 6.0-rc1
  • Ambiguous Map method with Minimal #35323
    External, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks
  • Suspend Razor.BackgroundDocumentGenerator during solution close #34603
    Perf, area-perf, area-razor.tooling, 17.0-Preview4

Updated

  • Model binding fails with FormatException if dictionary key is numeric type and value is missing from POST #35594
    bug, area-web-frameworks
  • Publish nightly builds to an LKG location #35457
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Support route parameter optionality via route string #34553
    enhancement, area-mvc, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc2
  • Add horizontal scrolling support to Virtualize component #28813
    help wanted, enhancement, area-blazor, good first issue, severity-blocking, affected-medium, feature-blazor-virtualization, Backlog
  • Unable to get host builder from derived class when using top-level statements with WebApplicationFactory #33846
    bug, Priority:0, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • ILEmitTrieFactory isn't linker friendly #24725
    bug, feature-routing, linker-friendliness, affected-few, severity-major, area-web-frameworks, .NET 7-Candidate
  • AspNetCore Mvc Controller keeps serializing IAsyncEnumerable after connection is closed #35330
    bug, Priority:0, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Html.ActionLink() returns incorrect URL when Minimal Action with Name metadata in use #35592
    bug, Priority:0, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Add `.cshtml.css` styles in default project templates #31030
    Working, enhancement, area-mvc, feature-css-isolation, feature-templates, 6.0-rc2
  • ODE (Safe handle has been closed) after IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping callback is called on HttpSysServer #35491
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, 6.0-rc2
  • Upgrading default Blazor template from 5.0 to 6.0 preview 7 causes fallback endpoint _Host not being found. #35403
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, Status: No Recent Activity
  • Calling InvokeAsync(StateHasChanged) causes page to fallback to default culture #28521
    bug, Working, area-blazor, severity-major, affected-medium, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor InputFile RequestImageFileAsync not revoking ObjectURL #35156
    bug, Working, area-blazor, good first issue, 6.0-rc2
  • Keyboard input doesn't work for InputDateType.DateTimeLocal #35498
    Working, investigate, area-blazor, feature-accessibility, 6.0-rc2
  • Support custom error messages for optionality via nullability feature #35501
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/3: Get QUIC tests running on CI #34741
    blocked, area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP3, Next sprint planning
  • W3CLogging "time" not precise enough, leading to "time-taken" being significantly wrong #35613
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • WebApplicationBuilder allows changing the IHostEnvironment via the ConfigurationManager #34932
    bug, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor: InputFile out of memory #35583
    area-blazor, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • Startup regression: connectionclose, endpoint, fortunes, fortunes_ef #35626
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, json_nodejs, plaintext #35625
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, plaintext #35624
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Startup regression: json, plaintext #35627
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Add cs-bytes and sc-bytes to the W3CLogger #35614
    area-runtime, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Single file build time regression: json, json, json, proxy-yarp #35629
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Autogenerated code can't compile in VS preview version. #35554
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:, area-razor.compiler, 6.0-rc2
  • Improve console output of "dotnet watch" to make it clearer #35562
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, feature-dotnetwatch, 6.0.0
  • Untrusted localhost certificate used by Visual Studio to debug Blazor prevents WASM Debugging #35618
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts
  • New Service Fabric ASP.NET Core React application does not run #35458
    area-mvc, feature-spa, Discussions
  • Set asp-append-version to true for everything #35553
    enhancement, area-mvc, feature-mvc-razor-views, Backlog
  • Can't run blank, newly created Blazor WASM app with ASP.Net Hosting and Individual Authentication #35337
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • Blazor wasm: Uncaught (in promise) Error: System.InvalidOperationException: There was an error parsing the event arguments. EventId: '13'. #35348
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #35555
    investigate, area-blazor, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor RunAOTCompilation fails during BlazorWebAssembly.ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.Execute #35633
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-razor-sdk, 6.0.0
  • Throw informative exception when Input Controls are not surrounded by EditForm #27804
    bug, Working, area-blazor, component ecosystem, severity-minor, affected-medium, reevaluate, feature-blazor-builtin-components, 6.0-rc2
  • Add docs for using HTTP/3 with HTTP.sys #35204
    Docs, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, HTTP3, 6.0-rc2
  • Add Api Parameter Description to Api Description to represent the request body #35421
    api-suggestion, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Add support for Output Caching #27387
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, design-proposal, Theme: meeting developer expectations, .NET 7-Candidate
  • [Blazor] Availability of User in Startup #35611
    area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Unable to build components #35192
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Better compose/organize/design pattern for all asp.net core developer #35367
    Discussions
  • Microsoft.Extensions.* pieces don't have symbols. #29327
    task, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, razor.tooling-fundamentals, Razor.Tooling
  • Improve HTTP/2 performance by using Channels #30235
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP2, Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid using new C# language features in Razor code generation #35680
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35678
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35677
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Don't cache CanReuse value #35676
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35674
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Update HotReloadAgent to SDK https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet… #35673
    area-blazor
  • Add support for WithTags extension method #35672
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix 'HeadOutlet' getting trimmed away for Blazor WebAssembly prerendered apps after publish #35671
    area-blazor
  • Get Quic tests running in CI again #35669
    area-infrastructure
  • Update templates to use scoped CSS #35658
    area-mvc
  • Add ApiParameterDescription to ApiDescription to represent the request body - 35421 #35654
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Don't cache CanReuse value #35575
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35675
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35593
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • Authorization Failure Reasons #35668
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35670
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35646
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35659
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35635
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35426
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Merge from 'release/6.0-rc1' into 'release/6.0' #35588
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Cancel the token when it's created after an Abort/Disconnect #35566
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [SPA] Ensure spawned NPM processes are terminated when the dotnet process is ungracefully terminated #35591
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Backport minimal action API changes to 6.0-rc1 #35632
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Reliability improvement for input date E2E tests #35616
    area-blazor, tell-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Add installer artifacts to source build intermediate #35615
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35492
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35634
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • Add Support for `DateOnly` & `TimeOnly` for `SupplyParameterFromQuery` #35569
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update docker container to mcr #35630
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0-rc1

Updated

  • Release object URL after image for resize has loaded #35499
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Blazor input component support when EditContext is not supplied #35640
    area-blazor
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35547
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Delay closing SignalR connections on shutdown #34438
    area-signalr
  • [release/3.1] Expose all references when not restoring #33197
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.20
  • Make hosting request log into struct to reduce allocation #34999
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Update docker container to mcr #35637
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Update docker container to mcr #35636
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
